title: Yasuo with crit Masteries gets no Self heal anymore ?!?!?! Bug ???
body:
I play Yasuo{{champion:157}} with 18 / 12 / 0 crit masteries but like in the beginning of the pre patch , yasuo gets not anymore the 15 % self heal of crits ... I heard it happen to other Summoners wit other Champions too , like jinx o tryndamere?

Did Rito  changed something ?

replies.body: ohh okay , thx very much guys :-) this will help me alot :-){{summoner:4}}

Yes, rito hotfixed the mastery, it only works on champs now.

Patch: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-522-notes
Ja man heilt nur noch bei Champions, also nicht mehr bei minions.
